name: Jewel Wars
description:
Think you are good at jewel swapping? Test your skills against an opponent and find out!

Jewel Wars is a turn-based, gem swapping game that will blow you away! Tons of power-ups, opponents and skill levels.

If you like jewel swapping games - this is the one to play. It's not just how you play it, but also how is your opponent reacting to your play.
Can you go all the way up the ladder and beat all of the opponents?

- 12 different opponents with different skills
- 8 rounds to go through against each opponent
- Awesome power-ups
- Beautiful graphics and sound
- Challenging and well-made gameplay

You will love Jewel Wars' competitive angle!
